kv18.7:2.3: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:3.3: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:4.1: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:4.3: Hañci dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:5.1: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:5.3: Hañci tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:6.1: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:6.3: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:7.1: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:7.3: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.1: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.3: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:9.1: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:9.3: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:14.1: Dvinnaṁ jhānānaṁ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhīti?
kv18.7:14.3: Nanu avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭuppannanti?
kv18.7:14.5: Hañci avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭuppannaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:14.6: “dvinnaṁ jhānānaṁ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikā”ti.
kv18.7:15.8: Tena hi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikāti.
kv18.7:16.4: “savitakko savicāro samādhi”, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhī”ti?
kv18.7:16.8: avicāro samādhi”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
